title: A new way to discover DNA modifications

title_detail.value: A new way to discover DNA modifications

summary: DNA is made from four nucleosides, each known by its own letter -- A, G, C, and T. However, since the structure of DNA was deciphered in 1953, scientists have discovered several other variants that are often added to the DNA sequences to replace one of the usual four letters.
